name: Dungeons And Doors
description:
As the sacred protector sworn to protect your reality from interdimensional threats and hazard,
you have been chosen to fight the evil wizard Derlin who is trying to merge your world with the dark dimension. You will find him in his Tower of Dimensions!

Enter the magical tower and encounter loads of evil monsters and weird creatures and explore a world full of magic and spells. But beware! Due to his crazy experiments you might end up in a dimensional rift teleporting you to the
dark dimension!

***FEATURES***

-Over 100 Different Levels
-Collecting Coins to Buy Different Warriors(10+)
-Great Variety of Monsters to Fight!
-Boss Encounters
-Escape Room like Riddles
-Loads of Items with different Effects and Uses
-Unique Pre Rendered 3D Graphics
-Flipbook like Animations

*******
